import { Story, Preview, Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { withKnobs, boolean } from '@storybook/addon-knobs';
import basicDemo from './demo/basic.twig';
import data from './demo/data.json';
import './table.scss';

<Meta title="Components/Vendor/Wordpress/Table" decorators={[withKnobs]} />

# Gutenberg Table (core/table) block

The `wp-block-table` class on a container element applies default styling to HTML `table` elements.
A table block can optionally have a header and a footer.

<Preview>
  <Story name="Basic">
    {basicDemo({
      hasHeader: boolean('Include Header', true),
      hasFooter: boolean('Include Footer', true),
      isStriped: boolean('Add is-style-striped modifier to the container', false),
      numericData: boolean('Add has-text-aligned-right modifier to all cells', false),
      hasFixedLayout: boolean('Add has-fixed-layout modifier to table', false),
      tableData: data,
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>

## Striped Table

The `is-style-striped` modifier adds alternating background colors to table rows.

<Preview>
  <Story name="Striped">
    {basicDemo({
      hasHeader: boolean('Include Header', true),
      hasFooter: boolean('Include Footer', true),
      isStriped: true,
      numericData: boolean('Add has-text-aligned-right modifier to all cells', false),
      hasFixedLayout: boolean('Add has-fixed-layout modifier to table', false),
      tableData: data,
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>

## Fixed Layout Table

The `has-fixed-layout` modifier on the `table` element makes all columns equal width

<Preview>
  <Story name="Fixed Layout">
    {basicDemo({
      hasHeader: boolean('Include Header', true),
      hasFooter: boolean('Include Footer', true),
      isStriped: boolean('Add is-style-striped modifier to the container', false),
      numericData: boolean('Add has-text-aligned-right modifier to all cells', false),
      hasFixedLayout: true,
      tableData: data,
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>

## Numeric Data

Tables with lots of numeric data use a couple of modifications to make them
easier to read and understand.

Numeric cells are right-aligned and use tabular figures to make it easier to
compare cells across a column.

These changes can be achieved by adding c-table--numeric to the table.

<Preview>
  <Story name="Numeric Data">
    {basicDemo({
      hasHeader: boolean('Include Header', true),
      hasFooter: boolean('Include Footer', true),
      isStriped: boolean('Add is-style-striped modifier to the container', false),
      numericData: true,
      hasFixedLayout: boolean('Add has-fixed-layout modifier to table', false),
      tableData: data,
    })}
  </Story>
</Preview>
